article.title: An Infrared Photometric and Spectroscopic Study of Post-AGB Stars

multiple_choice_question.text: Which group of stars occupies positions in the IRAS color-color diagram that indicate very cool circumstellar shells?
Which panel in Figure 2a showcases the Spitzer IRS spectrum of a PAGB star exhibiting a prominent broad bump around 11 Âµm without PAH features?
What does the dotted line in Figure 2b represent?
choices: The global continuum of the spectrum
The sum of the fitted Gaussian profiles
The individual Gaussian profile for a single PAH feature

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of dust shell geometry is used in the model SEDs shown in Figure 3?
What do the open circles in Figure 4 represent?
choices: Observed data points from the literature
Pivotal points for defining the continuum
Error bars for the model data points
